title: I Love Fluffy Things!
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Uwaah~! So cute~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu, aren’t they? You can touch them<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Hello Alpaca-san. Can I hug you? Huuug~.... Fwaah.... She’s so soft.... There, there, good girl~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>She seems to like it too. You’re very good with animals, huh, Emma-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I have a pet goat back in my home in Switzerland. Maybe that’s why. ....Aaah~, it’s been a while since I felt this kind of fluffiness.... It’s so soothing~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>It’s amazing how she can soothe you, Emma-san.... Can I hug her too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Of course, let’s hug her together. Huug~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Haah.... She’s so warm and fluffy.... It feels good.... I’m getting kind of sleepy....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>You’re sleepy? Then would you like to use my lap as a pillow? Kanata-chan always takes naps on my lap, so it probably feels good<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ehehe, then Kotori will take you up on that offer!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
